Description: Job DescriptionRequirementsHe/She must have a minimum qualification BSc, BEng, BA or equivalent, have Chartered status and more than 15 years experience with 7 years being similar to this project/role in KSA.An experienced Construction Manager with a demonstrable track record in the delivery of large multi functional projects - Buildings, Infrastrcuture and UtilitiesPrinciple ActivitiesRewards & BenefitsWorker TypeJob TypeAt SNC-Lavalin, we seek to hire individuals with diverse characteristics, backgrounds and perspectives. We strongly believe that world-class talent makes no distinctions based on gender, ethnic or national origin, sexual identity and orientation, age, religion or disability, but enriches itself through these differences.SNC-Lavalin cares about your privacy.Job Details
